tool.name: conf4circos
tool.description: : Create configuration file and files needed to draw circos
tool.command:
source $__tool_directory__/include_scaffremodler.sh ; python $__tool_directory__/conf4circos.py
#if str($reference_genome.source) == "history": --ref $reference_genome.own_file #else: --ref $reference_genome.index.fields.path #end if --chr $chr #if $have_cov.have_cov_opt == "yes" --cov $have_cov.cov --window $have_cov.window --orient $orient #end if
#if $have_frf.have_frf_opt == "yes" --frf $have_frf.frf #end if
#if $have_ff.have_ff_opt == "yes" --ff $have_ff.ff #end if
#if $have_rr.have_rr_opt == "yes" --rr $have_rr.rr #end if
#if $have_ins.have_ins_opt == "yes" --ins $have_ins.ins #end if
#if $have_delet.have_delet_opt == "yes" --delet $have_delet.delet #end if
#if $have_chr_rr.have_chr_rr_opt == "yes" --chr_rr $have_chr_rr.chr_rr #end if
#if $have_chr_rf.have_chr_rf_opt == "yes" --chr_rf $have_chr_rf.chr_rf #end if
#if $have_chr_ff.have_chr_ff_opt == "yes" --chr_ff $have_chr_ff.chr_ff #end if
#if $have_chr_fr.have_chr_fr_opt == "yes" --chr_fr $have_chr_fr.chr_fr #end if
#if $have_liste.have_liste_opt == "yes" --liste_read $have_liste.liste_read #end if
#if $have_dis.have_dis_opt == "yes" --dis_prop $have_dis.dis_prop #end if
#if $have_agp.have_agp_opt == "yes" --agp $have_agp.agp #end if --out_kar $out_kar --out_N $out_N --out_cov $out_cov --out_frf $out_frf --out_ff $out_ff --out_rr $out_rr --out_ins $out_ins --out_delet $out_delet --out_chr_rr $out_chr_rr --out_chr_rf $out_chr_rf --out_chr_ff $out_chr_ff --out_chr_fr $out_chr_fr --Rout_rf $Rout_rf --Rout_fr $Rout_fr --Rout_ff $Rout_ff --Rout_rr $Rout_rr --Rout_ins $Rout_ins --Rout_delet $Rout_delet --Rout_chr_rr $Rout_chr_rr --Rout_chr_rf $Rout_chr_rf --Rout_chr_ff $Rout_chr_ff --Rout_chr_fr $Rout_chr_fr --out_scaff $out_scaff --output $output

param.name: source
param.label: Will you select a reference genome from your history or use a built-in index?
param.help: Built-ins were indexed using default options. See `Indexes` section of help below
param.option: Use a genome from the history and build index

param.name: index
param.label: Select reference genome
param.help: If your genome of interest is not listed, contact the South Green team

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: own_file
param.label: Select reference genome

param.name: chr
param.label: Chromosome file (generated by 1_create_conf or tabulated file with chr_name in col1 and length in col2)

param.name: orient
param.label: The upstream/downstream mate orientation for valid paired-end alignment against the forward reference strand

param.name: have_cov_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw coverage?

param.name: cov
param.label: The coverage file

param.name: window
param.label: Window size for which mean insert size will be calculated

param.name: have_frf_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw discordant rf or fr link?

param.name: frf
param.label: fr or rf score file depending on expected orientation

param.name: have_ff_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw ff link?

param.name: ff
param.label: ff score file

param.name: have_rr_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw rr link?

param.name: rr
param.label: rr score file

param.name: have_ins_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw ins link?

param.name: ins
param.label: ins score file

param.name: have_delet_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw delet link?

param.name: delet
param.label: delet score file

param.name: have_chr_rr_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw chr_rr link?

param.name: chr_rr
param.label: chr_rr score file

param.name: have_chr_ff_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw chr_ff link?

param.name: chr_ff
param.label: chr_ff score file

param.name: have_chr_fr_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw chr_fr link?

param.name: chr_fr
param.label: chr_fr score file

param.name: have_chr_rf_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw chr_rf link?

param.name: chr_rf
param.label: chr_rf score file

param.name: have_liste_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw paired read link?

param.name: liste_read
param.label: The list_dis file

param.name: have_dis_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw discordant proportions

param.name: dis_prop
param.label: The proportion file

param.name: have_agp_opt
param.label: Do you want to draw a layer representing scaffold positions?

param.name: agp
param.label: An agp file locating scaffold

param.name: OUT
param.label: Identifier for output
